name: SetPlayerObjectNoCameraCol
notes: This does not work inside the normal SA map boundaries.
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3.7 and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Toggles a player object camera collision.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The playerID the object belongs to.

params_body.name: objectid
params_body.description: The ID of the object you want to toggle.

return_values: 1 - Regardless of if the object exists or not.
related_fn: SetObjectNoCameraCol: Disables collisions between camera and object.
